cb5a59fc6baf5de204e3cc99be6ba9865e44350a.commitMessage:
Fix typos in blocks, headers and filters packages. #1555

Fixes some `SpellCheckingInspection` inspection violations.

Description:
>Spellchecker inspection helps locate typos and misspelling in your code, comments and literals.

4fd298b00126d60147dce7631c6e0d3e0921f82f.commitMessage:
Rename ignored catch parameters. #1555

Fixes `UnusedCatchParameter` inspection violations.

Description:
Reports any catch parameters that are unused in their corresponding blocks. This inspection will not report any catch parameters named "ignore" or "ignored". Conversely this inspection will warn on any catch parameters named "ignore" or "ignored" that are actually used.

ebd4afdebe8ee09c0e6c7d1239e2ca982f87e51c.commitMessage:
Deleted cache from Utils class + unified setters with patterns

Issue #845

b83c9aceef9577eaada5cfd78bc7b2cd04a176d1.commitMessage: Simplified the code by removing HeaderInfo classes, they were introduced to avoid code duplication between header checks in two separate inheritance trees (Java Check vs. FileSetCheck). Now that we have only FileSetChecks as Header checks, this delegation is no longer necessary.

bf16d371dab210594755d04afc4697269ed088c0.commitMessage: converting the header checks to be fileset based.

2a96f3f8909df111882e075196adc2f1545e23f6.commitMessage: Fixed 1455575 - RegexpHeader reports wrong line number

6f1f7bd3fdcca84404e97964b3e48de6db5024ec.commitMessage:
Added CrossLanguageRegexpHeaderCheck. This involved some refactorings to avoid duplicate code, so lots of files are affected
- moved AbstractHeaderCheck to header package
- moved file extension filtering code to Utils, so it's available not only from FileSetChecks
- moved regexp header checking logic to RegexpHeaderChecker bean
- moved check initialization logic and parameter checking to HeaderInfo classes
